Detailed Description

Garbage collector.

Counts number of references to an object and when it drops to zero, deletes the object. All classes that are to be garbage collected must inherit GC.

Member Function Documentation

void DRMPlugin::GC::DwCount (   )  [inline]
 

Decrease reference count.

If reference count drops to zero, deletes the object.
